function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through close contact during classes and interview sessions","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission within the employee community","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene measures, social distancing, and use of personal protective equipment (PPE)","Technologies":"Use of air purification systems and contactless technology for material exchange","People":"Employees attending the classes, instructors, and resort staff","Owner":"Resort management and health and safety team"},{"Description":"Lack of awareness and education about contagious diseases and preventive measures","Impact":"Higher susceptibility to disease transmission and lack of adherence to preventive protocols","Mitigation":"Provide educational materials, training sessions, and regular updates on disease prevention","Technologies":"Online learning platforms, virtual training sessions, and communication apps for information dissemination","People":"Employees participating in the MasterClass and resort staff","Owner":"Resort management and healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Inadequate healthcare facilities and response protocols for disease outbreaks","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and limited capacity to handle medical emergencies","Mitigation":"Develop emergency response plans, establish healthcare partnerships, and provide access to telemedicine services","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, remote monitoring devices, and digital health records","People":"Resort employees and guests","Owner":"Resort management and healthcare professionals"}]}
